name: Chen Lo
story: Shirong Fu grew up in a village in China where he learned discipline from his parents who were both martial artists. His skills and discipline caught the attention of the Chinese army and he was recruited when he was 18. Since then, he has proven himself to be an adept and efficient soldier, quickly rising through the ranks. He is a fierce leader who always puts the mission first and expects the same from his squad. However, he never forgets the importance of discipline and respect for his superiors.
